validateLoanDate

protected boolean validateLoanDate(EquipmentLoanOrReturnDocument equipmentLoanOrReturnDocument)
Implementation of the rule that if a document has a valid expect loan date and loan return date, the both dates should come before the 2 years limit.

Parameters:
equipmentLoanOrReturnDocument - the equipmentLoanOrReturn document to be validated
Returns:
boolean false if the expect loan date or loan return date is not before the 2 years limit.
